title: Lewandowski Accuses Bayern of Lies
description:
The FC crew react to Robert Lewandowski's exclusive interview with Cristina Alexander in which the striker accused Bayern Munich of making up "bulls---" in order to appease the club's supporters over his exit. Plus, Luis Garcia and Jan Aage Fjortoft joins the show to preview tomorrow's FA Community Shield and react to Cristiano Ronaldo seemingly confirming his return to Manchester United.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Robert Lewandowski hits back at Bayern over his exit; Community Shield Preview; Ronaldo Confirms Man United Return
